channel.title: Posts on David King - Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on David King - Portfolio

item.title: TLM Projects
item.description: Volunteering with Yayasan Tanaoba Lais Manekat (TLM - We Serve With Love) in Kupang, West Timor, Indonesia, my role was as clean water advisor, capacity building WASH principles to local Kupang based staff, the field facilitators and communities.

item.title: TC Pam Recovery - Vanuatu
item.description: A two month mission with the Vanuatu Red Cross for WASH assessment on TC Pam Recovery. Designed spring capture water supply systems and completed four day needs assessment.

item.title: GIS
item.description: Helsinki City bikes mapping and spatial funcationality: https://davemk00.github.io/HelCityBikes/

item.title: Research
item.description:
My main focus of research was in water resources, particularly Urban Water Supply Systems. My PhD looked at the sensitivity of the yield of water systems to climate variability and modelling parameters.

Since my interests have diversified to flood forecasting, modelling, and mitigation.
